flawed_nl_solution:
He wants to serve 5 shrimp per guest and will have 40 guests so he needs 5*40 = <<5*40=20>>20 shrimp
Each pound of shrimp has 20 shrimp and he needs 20 shrimp so he needs 20/20 = <<20/20=1>>1 pounds of shrimp
The shrimp is $17.00 per pound and he needs 1 pounds so he will spend 17*1 = $<<17*1=17>>17 on shrimp
#### 17

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 20. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
